ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Part I â€“ Definition of Canadian)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (Part I - Definition of Canadian) in order to maintain the status quo 25% foreign ownership threshold for SPECIALITY AIR SERVICE, while allowing increases in foreign ownership thresholds for passenger and cargo air transportation, from 25% to 49%.
